keyword: how many calories in a fried chicken wing
title: How Many Calories in a Fried Chicken Wing?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a fried chicken wing, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Fried Chicken Wing?
assumptions: Bone-in, skin-on chicken wing, breaded and deep-fried in oil, no added sauce or seasonings beyond salt.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, breading type, oil used, frying method, and brand; check labels or recipes for precision.

quick_answer.text: One fried chicken wing has about 159 kcal, with 11 g protein and 12 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a fried chicken wing?
faqs.a: Approximately 159 kcal for one average-sized, breaded and fried wing.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a fried chicken wing?
faqs.a: About 11 g of protein per wing, mainly from the meat.

faqs.q: Are fried chicken wings high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 12 g total fat per wing, including 3 g saturated fat from skin and oil.

faqs.q: How does frying affect calories compared to grilled?
faqs.a: Frying adds 50-100 kcal per wing due to absorbed oil and breading.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in a fried chicken wing?
faqs.a: Roughly 300 mg per wing, higher if extra salt or seasonings are added.
